name: Grassmere Inn Bed and Breakfast

reviews.text: If I only knew! Thankfully we only stayed for two nights.
reviews.title: Glad we had a car, so we could leave!

reviews.text: Our room looked like it was from 1960, as in the same furniture, sheets, towels, and bedspread, have been there since then. When we arrived our room was not "ready", but we could put our luggage there. When we returned an hour later our room had the same nasty, and apparently not washed, bedspread from the previous user. Additionally, the windows did not even stay open.
reviews.title: Mixed review

description: Located in Westhampton Beach, the Grassmere Inn Hotel has been completely refurbished. Our 25-room hotel is the largest historic accommodation in the Hamptons. Our location in Westhampton Beach is within 75 miles of Manhattan. We offer rooms with private baths, shared baths, and suites. Daily maid service, complimentary newspapers, daily events listing, internet access, and continental breakfast are included. Afternoon beverages are served on the porch. Use of Eastside Tennis Academy is included in the various packages we offer. Beach passes are also available for our guests. The beach is within walking distance of the hotel. Use of outdoor grills, playground set and bocce ball are encouraged. No smoking in any of the buildings or on the porches.
